data.name: Rheksetor: Waves of Fury
data.detailed_description:
Explore the fragmented remains of Rheksetor, conquer enemies, and secure a future among the stars for humanity

Set in the far future, after a catastrophic planetary explosion, evil forces are trying to take all remaining natural resources and destroy any hope of peace and stability. As a faithful zealot of The Order, your mission is to stop them.

Rheksetor: Waves of Fury is a rapidly evolving game with many different planned and potential features to be added in the future.

Current Features:
Explore one of the many fragments of Rheksetor,
Activated skills to use during combat
Defeat waves of enemies
Build new structures to gather more resources
Customize your character loadout with a variety of spells

Planned Features:
Equipment loot drops to customize and improve your character (including set items)
Unique vehicles to help you fight enemies and travel around the fragments of Rheksetor
Combat mechanics that fit the theme of each element (frost slows, fire burns over time, blood drains, etc)
Semi-randomized "biome" regions within the larger world map fragments
Wider range of sector types, offering different kinds of challenges
NPC's that offer a wide variety of quests
AI-controlled allies to assist in combat
More enemies and loot variety

Potential Features:
Multiplayer co-op and competitive modes
Tech trees for structures and vehicles, allowing a wider range of progression choices
Aesthetic theme packs to personalize your space-faring experience
A rich story driven campaign
Planned content improvement (monthly updates - and special themed updates for major holidays):

data.short_description: Explore the fragmented remains of Rheksetor, conquer enemies, and secure a future among the stars for humanity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.5 GIGAHERTZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 500 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.5 GIGAHERTZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 500 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
